page.title: 11WEST MERSEA LOCAL NEWS.
page.content: Here is some local news from Essex County Standard June 1985. Miss Margaret Sweeting left the health Clinic she had been with the health Service for nine years. Soon Miss Margaret Sweeting will be moving to Wales.Two weeks ago West Mersea flower club won a silver medal in the Chelsea flower show.Last week,Stephen Perry,a pupil of Thomas Lord Audley School in Colchester, saved his brother from drowning in a pond near Mill Road.He was awarded a medal for his bravery.On the 14th of June 1985 Mrs Jill Keene won a trip to France on a Concorde.She went with her friend Toni Butcher. The Mersea Island choir club are holding a Victorian Musical at St Peters and St Pauls Church in West Mersea.
